metadata.Title: CVE-2017-10685 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In ncurses 6.0, there is a format string vulnerability in the fmt_entry function. A crafted input will lead to a remote arbitrary code execution attack.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Red Hat considers this issue as a duplicate of CVE-2017-10684. ccdm94> fix availabe in patch 20170701 for ncurses 6.0.

criterions.comment: ncurses: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
